mapper.select: SELECT carNum, carKind, sczonenum, carModel, carMaking FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(have_car carNum) */ ROWNUM rn, carNum, carModel, carMaking, carKind, sczonenum FROM have_car WHERE ((NULLIF(#{carSmall}, '') is null AND NULLIF(#{carMiddle}, '') is null AND NULLIF(#{carBig}, '') is null AND NULLIF(#{carSUV}, '') is null) OR (carKind = #{carSmall} OR carKind = #{carMiddle} OR carKind = #{carBig} OR carKind = #{carSUV})) AND ((#{zoneType} != 0 AND sczonenum = #{zoneType}) OR #{zoneType} = 0 ) AND rownum <= 20) where rn > 0
